Sept. 2, 1933 D Measham Contest
Measham Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
measham-contest
None
Happy Memories
Measham, Leicestershire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £5, 2nd £2.10s., 3rd £1.10s. March contest - 1st Cheslyn Hay, 2nd Church Gresley, 3rd Moira Colliery. 1st annual contest promoted by Measham British Legion. 6 bands competed.
Dec. 20, 2013, 11:20 a.m. Jan. 31, 2014, 11:18 a.m.
1 Cheslyn Hay G. Hart
2 Gresley Colliery Band T. Broster
3 Newhall Band J. J. Sibson
Unknown Result Anstey Town Unknown
Unknown Result Moira Colliery James Astle
